name: Spectral Dog Morgue: 1939
description: You play as young dog, Barks Nightly. Trying to get back on his feet after the recent economic depression he finds himself taking a job at a local morgue, one of the only businesses that has not gone completely under in the wake of the market crash. One night when going through the motions with the deceased he finds himself thrusted into the past of one of the departed.
